title: Chapter 1859 - Before Spiritual Desolation Mountain
body:
Chapter 1859 - Before Spiritual Desolation Mountain

Ten days later.

Deep within the Eastern Sea, the dome of heaven was dark, overcast, and permeated with mist.

Whoosh!

The Sky-Covering Boat appeared out of nowhere with Su Yi and Lin Feng on board.

“It’s been a long, long time since I was last here… So long that I’ve forgotten how long it’s been…” Lin Feng’s gaze was bleak.

A wandering son had returned home, but he was hesitant to approach.

The sight of Spiritual Desolation Mountain only filled his heart with endless grief. Thus, it had been a long time since he’d last visited.

“Does that mean that not even you know how the mountain has changed over the years?” asked Su Yi.

Lin Feng nodded. “Yes, so I recommend against approaching recklessly.”

He felt deeply conflicted. He hoped that after Su Yi entered Spiritual Desolation Mountain, the sight would stir his emotions and give him an opportunity to fuse with the memories of his past life.

But Spiritual Desolation Mountain was so perilous that he worried something would happen to Su Yi.

Su Yi smiled. “I’m very interested in the Dao Manifestation Chaos Stele you told me about, and I too want to see whether I can find anything...
